The claim is made by Marco Rubio: a U.S. Senator, and is supported by his statement that Common Core is being used by the Obama administration to turn the Department of Education into a national school board.
Jeb Bush: a former governor, disputes the claim and states that Common Core is not being used for this purpose. He argues that it is a national imperative and not a federal government program.
The expert: s verdict includes the fact that Common Core is a set of national education standards adopted by 45 states, including Florida. It was developed through discussions between private nonprofit groups and state education departments.
The Obama administration has used its ed: Race to the Top, to encourage states to adopt Common Core, but no state is required to adhere to these standards.
